/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the perspective. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
